title: The ArmyPlanner Open-Format Game-Index schema
description: This schema comprises the game-index JSON format from the ArmyPlanner Open Format.

title.title: the title of the game
title.description: contains the title of the game (like the name was given by the editor)

description.title: an optional description for the game
description.description: contains a description of the game - note: the description is given as markdown code

codices.title: the codex-list schema
codices.description: contains a list of codex-index objects

anyOf.title: the codex-index schema
anyOf.description: contains a codex-index object with the index-data for the codex

title.title: the title of the codex
title.description: contains the title of the codex (like the name was given by the editor)

description.title: a description for the codex
description.description: contains a description for the codex - note: the description is given as markdown code

enabled.title: an optional parameter for the codex to enable or disable this codex entry
enabled.description: If false, this codx entry should not be loaded. If enabled is not set, the codex can be loaded as well.

path.title: the codex-index path
path.description: specifies the path to the codex-file

created.title: the timestamp of the latest edit
